title: Invalid username and password
body: I can’t log into my main account (-snip-). Every time I try to reset my password I end up not receiving any emails. I made sure to check if I was on the right server and I was. Please help!!!

replies.body: I removed the username for privacy reasons.  No worries, reach out through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help recover and update the info on your account.  See you then!
So about how long will the process take?

Could be a day or longer, all our teams have a higher volume over the last few days.  Just don't create duplicate or reply to your own ticket (that can put you back on the bottom of the queue) until a specialist reaches out.  Hang tight!

Okay, because I was trying to purchase some of the skins I got in the shop but this created a bit of an inconvenience for me. Is there a way to prolong the shop if I haven’t gotten my account back by the time it ends?
